text: Amblypomacentrus is a small genus of fish in the family Pomacentridae. As of the year 2000, there are 3 species. ==Species== *Amblypomacentrus breviceps (Schlegel & MÃ¼ller, 1839) \- black-banded demoiselle *Amblypomacentrus clarus (Allen and Adrim, 2000) *Amblypomacentrus vietnamicus Prokofiev, 2004 ==References== ==Other websites== *Froese, R. and D. Pauly, Eds. Amblypomacentrus. FishBase. 2011. Category:Pomacentrinae
title: Amblypomacentrus
